SpaceXs launch director gave the green light on Saturday to fuel the rocket for an historic flight to the International Space Station by two veteran NASA astronauts.

articles.title: Pune telescope helps detect biggest explosion since Big Bang - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The explosion is estimated to release five times more energy than previous record holder and came from a supermassive black hole at the centre of a galaxy hundreds of millions of light years away

articles.title: ISRO releases latest photos of Moon craters taken by Chandrayaan-2 - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The space agency said the pictures of the lunar surface were taken on August 23 by the Terrain Mapping Camera-2 of Chandrayaan-2 from an altitude of about 4,375 km.
